title: Biological Feature
description: A biological feature like a Gene, Protein, Cellular Structure.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the feature

preferred_label.title: Preferred label
preferred_label.description: A provided label that can override the automatically calculated display_title - only submit if the calculated title does not work

feature_type.title: Feature Type
feature_type.description: A sequence ontology term indicating the type of feature

genome_location.title: Genomic Location
genome_location.description: The location(s) of the feature on the genome
genome_location.comment: A BioFeature can be a simple location and if so must have this field and appropriate type from SO

items.title: Genomic Region
items.description: Item indicating genome assembly, chromosome and coordinates of the region

relevant_gene.title: Gene
relevant_gene.description: Gene ID if the feature is or can be associated with a gene (eg. protein produced by a gene)

cellular_structure.title: Cellular Structure
cellular_structure.description: If the feature is a cellular structure such as a chromosome use this field and set type to 'cellular_component'
